common.CREATE_AN_AGENT_DESCRIPTION: Napravite agenta tako da dodate ime/cilj i pritisnete Deploy!
common.TO_LEARN_MORE_ABOUT_AGENTGPT: Da biste dobili više informacija o AgentGPT-u, njegovom Planu, itd., posjetite sljedeću poveznicu
common.if-you-are-facing-issues-please-head-ove: Ako imate problema, obratite se našem

help.INTERACTION_WITH_WEBSITES_AND_PEOPLE: Interakcija s web stranicama i ljudima 👨‍👩‍👦
help.INTRODUCING_AGENTGPT: omogućuje vam konfiguriranje i pokretanje samostalnih AI agenata u vašem pregledniku. Nazovite svoj prilagođeni AI agent i odredite njegov cilj. AI agent će pokušati postići određeni cilj stvaranjem zadataka, izvršavanjem zadataka, a zatim procjenom rezultata 🚀
help.PLATFORM_BETA_DESCRIPTION: Ova platforma trenutno je u beta verziji, trenutno radimo na sljedećem:
help.TO_LEARN_MORE_ABOUT_AGENTGPT: Da biste saznali više o AgentGPT-u, njegovom planu, često postavljanim pitanjima itd., posjetite

settings.CONTROL_MAXIMUM_OF_TOKENS_DESCRIPTION: Kontrolira maksimalni broj tokena korištenih u svakom pojedinom API pozivu (viša vrijednost rezultira detaljnijim odgovorima, ali je skuplje).
settings.CONTROL_THE_MAXIMUM_NUM_OF_LOOPS: Kontrolira maksimalni broj petlji koje će agent pokrenuti (viša vrijednost rezultira više API poziva).
settings.GET_YOUR_OWN_APIKEY: Obtenez votre propre clé API OpenAI
settings.HERE_YOU_CAN_ADD_YOUR_OPENAI_API_KEY: Ovdje možete dodati svoj OpenAI API ključ. To znači da ćete morati platiti za korištenje vlastitog OpenAI tokena, ali ćete dobiti veći pristup ChatGPT-u! Također možete odabrati bilo koji model koji nudi OpenAI.
settings.HIGHER_VALUES_MAKE_OUTPUT_MORE_RANDOM: Više vrijednosti čine izlaz više slučajnim, dok niže vrijednosti čine izlaz usredotočenijim i preciznijim.
settings.INFO_TO_USE_GPT4: Za korištenje GPT-4 modela potreban je i API ključ. Možete ga nabaviti
settings.MUST_CONNECT_CREDIT_CARD: Napomena: Morate povezati kreditnu karticu s vašim računom
settings.NOTE_API_KEY_USAGE: Ovaj ključ se koristi samo u trenutnoj sesiji preglednika.
settings.NOTE_TO_GET_OPENAI_KEY: NAPOMENA: Da biste dobili API ključ, morate se registrirati za OpenAI račun na sljedećoj poveznici:
settings.PAUSE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Agent se pauzira nakon svakog seta zadataka.

chat.EXPERIENCING_EXCEPTIONAL_TRAFFIC: 🚨 Doživljavamo iznimno velik promet, očekujte kašnjenja i probleme ako ne koristite svoj vlastiti API ključ 🚨
chat.CREATE_AN_AGENT_DESCRIPTION: Kreirajte agenta dodavanjem imena/cilja i klikom na deploy!
chat.YOU_CAN_PROVIDE_YOUR_API_KEY: 📢 Možete koristiti svoj vlastiti OpenAI API ključ u kartici postavki za povećanje limita!
chat.CONSIDER_SPONSORING_ON_GITHUB: Molimo razmotrite sponzoriranje projekta na GitHubu.
chat.EMBARKING_ON_NEW_GOAL: Kreće se u ostvarivanje novog cilja:
chat.CONSOLE_UNABLE_TO_COPY_TO_CLIPBOARD: Nije moguće kopirati tekst u međuspremnik
chat.RESTART_IF_IT_TAKES_X_SEC: (Ponovo pokrenite ako ovo traje više od 30 sekundi)
chat.👉 Create an agent by adding a name / goa: 👉 Izradite agenta dodavanjem imena/cilja i pritiskom na Deploy!

errors.ERROR_ACCESSING_OPENAI_API_KEY: Pogreška prilikom pristupa OpenAI API ključu. Provjerite ključ ili pokušajte kasnije.
errors.ERROR_ADDING_ADDITIONAL_TASKS: Pogreška prilikom dodavanja dodatnih zadataka. Moguće je da naš model ne može obraditi odgovor i to je uzrokovalo ovu pogrešku. Nastavljam...
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Dosegli ste maksimalni broj upita! Molimo usporite...😅
errors.AGENT_MAXED_OUT_LOOPS: Ovaj agent je dosegnuo maksimalni broj mogućih izvršavanja. Kako biste sačuvali novac, ovaj će agent sada prestati raditi... Maksimalni broj izvršavanja agenta moguće je konfigurirati u postavkama.
errors.DEMO_LOOPS_REACHED: Žao nam je, ali budući da je ovo demo aplikacija, ne možemo izvoditi rad agenata predugo. Napomena: Ako želite dulje izvršavanje, molimo unesite vlastiti API ključ u Postavkama. Prestajem raditi...
errors.ERROR_API_KEY_QUOTA: Pogreška pri korištenju OpenAI API ključa. Premašili ste trenutnu kvotu, molimo provjerite svoje fakturiranje.
errors.ERROR_OPENAI_API_KEY_NO_GPT4: POGREŠKA: Vaš OpenAI API ključ nema pristup GPT-4. Prvo se morate prijaviti na OpenAI čekalici. (Ovo se razlikuje od ChatGPT Plus-a)
errors.ERROR_RETRIEVE_INITIAL_TASKS: Pogreška prilikom preuzimanja početnih zadataka. Pokušajte ponovno, jasnije definirajte cilj agenta ili ga prilagodite kako bi odgovarao našem modelu. Zaustavljam...

drawer.NEED_TO_SIGN_IN_AND_CREATE_AGENT_FIRST: Prvo morate stvoriti i spremiti svoj prvi agent prije nego što se ovdje pojavi išta!
drawer.SIGN_IN_NOTICE: Prijavite se da biste mogli spremiti svoje agente i upravljati svojim računom!

indexPage.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Sastavite, konfigurirajte i instalirajte autonomne AI agente u svom pregledniku.

common.CREATE_AN_AGENT_DESCRIPTION: Create an agent by adding a name / goal, and hitting deploy!

help.INTRODUCING_AGENTGPT: allows you to configure and deploy Autonomous AI agents. Name your custom AI and have it embark on any goal imaginable. It will attempt to reach the goal by thinking of tasks to do, executing them, and learning from the results 🚀
help.PLATFORM_BETA_DESCRIPTION: This platform is currently in beta, we are currently working on:
help.TO_LEARN_MORE_ABOUT_AGENTGPT: To learn more about AgentGPT, its roadmap, FAQ, etc, visit the

settings.CONTROL_MAXIMUM_OF_TOKENS_DESCRIPTION: Controls the maximum number of tokens used in each API call (higher value will make responses more detailed but cost more).
settings.CONTROL_THE_MAXIMUM_NUM_OF_LOOPS: Controls the maximum number of loops that the agent will run (higher value will make more API calls).
settings.GET_YOUR_OWN_APIKEY: Get your own OpenAI API key
settings.HERE_YOU_CAN_ADD_YOUR_OPENAI_API_KEY: Here you can add your OpenAI API key. This will require you to pay for your own OpenAI usage but give you greater access to AgentGPT! You can additionally select any model OpenAI offers.
settings.HIGHER_VALUES_MAKE_OUTPUT_MORE_RANDOM: Higher values will make the output more random, while lower values make the output more focused and deterministic.
settings.INFO_TO_USE_GPT4: To use the GPT-4 model, you need to also provide the API key for GPT-4. You can request for it
settings.MUST_CONNECT_CREDIT_CARD: Note: You must connect a credit card to your account
settings.NOTE_API_KEY_USAGE: This key is only used in the current browser session
settings.NOTE_TO_GET_OPENAI_KEY: NOTE: To get a key, sign up for an OpenAI account and visit the following
settings.PAUSE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Agent pauses after every set of task(s)

chat.CONSIDER_SPONSORING_ON_GITHUB: Please consider sponsoring the project on GitHub.
chat.CONSOLE_UNABLE_TO_COPY_TO_CLIPBOARD: Unable to copy text to clipboard
chat.CREATE_AN_AGENT_DESCRIPTION: 👉 Create an agent by adding a name / goal, and hitting deploy! Try our examples below!
chat.EXPERIENCING_EXCEPTIONAL_TRAFFIC: 🚨 We are experiencing exceptional traffic, expect delays and failures if you do not use your own API key🚨
chat.HELP_SUPPORT_THE_ADVANCEMENT_OF_AGENTGPT: 💝️ Help support the advancement of AgentGPT. 💝️
chat.RESTART_IF_IT_TAKES_X_SEC: (Restart if this takes more than 30 seconds)
chat.YOU_CAN_PROVIDE_YOUR_API_KEY: 📢 You can provide your own OpenAI API key in the settings tab for increased limits!
chat.👉 Create an agent by adding a name / goa: 👉 Create an agent by adding a name/target and pressing deploy!

errors.ERROR_ACCESSING_OPENAI_API_KEY: ERROR accessing the backend. Please email support@reworkd.ai or try again later
errors.ERROR_ADDING_ADDITIONAL_TASKS: ERROR adding additional task(s). It might have been against our model's policies to run them. Continuing.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Rate limit exceeded! Please slow down...😅
errors.AGENT_MAXED_OUT_LOOPS: This agent has maxed out on loops. To save your wallet, this agent is shutting down. You can configure the number of loops in the advanced settings.
errors.DEMO_LOOPS_REACHED: The agent has run out of loops. Update the number of loops in the settings menu if more loops are required. Shutting down.
errors.AGENT_MANUALLY_SHUT_DOWN: The agent has been manually shutdown.
errors.ERROR_API_KEY_QUOTA: ERROR using your OpenAI API key. You've exceeded your current quota, please check your plan and billing details.
errors.ERROR_OPENAI_API_KEY_NO_GPT4: ERROR your API key does not have GPT-4 access. You must first join OpenAI's wait-list. (This is different from ChatGPT Plus)
errors.ERROR_RETRIEVE_INITIAL_TASKS: ERROR retrieving initial tasks array. Retry, make your goal more clear, or revise your goal such that it is within our model's policies to run. Shutting Down.

drawer.SIGN_IN_NOTICE: to be able to save agents and manage your account!
drawer.NEED_TO_SIGN_IN_AND_CREATE_AGENT_FIRST: Create and save your first agent to get started!

indexPage.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Assemble, configure, and deploy autonomous AI Agents in your browser.
indexPage.PLACEHOLDER_AGENT_GOAL: What is the latest AI news?
